file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 53-11-03-04 - ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ACCESS-DOOR RUBBER SEAL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ACCESS-DOOR RUBBER SEAL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the electronic-compartment access-door rubber seal. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ACCESS- ALL 53-11-03-000-801-A DOOR RUBBER SEAL - REMOVAL ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ACCESS- ALL 53-11-03-400-801-A DOOR RUBBER SEAL - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 53-11-03 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-11-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ACCESS-DOOR RUBBER SEAL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the electronic-compartment access-door rubber seal. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 Electronic-compartment access door Forward fuselage I - LH 114 Electronic-compartment access door Forward fuselage I - RH D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: DO NOT PERMIT PERSONS TO GET ACCESS TO THE NOSE LANDING GEAR COMPARTMENT BEFORE YOU DO STEPS (1) THROUGH (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-11-03 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) Totally relieve the pressure of hydraulic system 1 of the aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036 ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) Install the safety pin to the solenoid valve of the nose landing gear door (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200) of the aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036. (3) Install the safety pin to the nose landing gear ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). (4) Open the electronic-compartment access door as follows: (a) Pull the pin to unlock the door. (b) Push the electronic-compartment access door to open it. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A NOTE: Do steps (1) through (3) only, to remove the rubber seal (2). (1) Remove the screws (9) and washers (8). (2) Remove the tracks (10) and (11). (3) Remove the electronic-compartment access door (1). (4) Remove the rubber seals (2) through (7) with a spatula and discard them. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-11-03 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ACCESS DOOR. 8. WASHER (8) 7. RUBBER SEAL 2. RUBBER SEAL 6. RUBBER SEAL 5. RUBBER SEAL DET. B 4. RUBBER SEAL 3. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-11-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ACCESS-DOOR RUBBER SEAL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the electronic-compartment access-door rubber seal. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL FORWARD ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT-DOOR AMM TASK 52-71-00-700-801-A/500 WARNING - OPERATIONAL CHECK IPC 53-11-00 FORWARD I SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 Electronic-compartment access door Forward fuselage I - LH 114 Electronic-compartment access door Forward fuselage I - RH D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area available E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Rubber gloves Hand protection AR available Commercially Safety goggles Eye protection AR available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MSM 34-025 RTV 157 Silicone sealant AR ASTM-D-740 Methyl-ethyl-ketone AR EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 53-11-03 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Rubber seal IPC 53-11-00 1 Rubber seal IPC 53-11-00 1 Rubber seal IPC 53-11-00 2 Rubber seal IPC 53-11-00 2 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A NOTE: Wear the rubber gloves and safety goggles to protect yourself against chemical products. (1) Remove the old sealant from the fuselage surface with the spatula. (2) Clean the fuselage surface with methyl-ethyl-ketone. J. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A NOTE: Do steps (3) through (5) below if the electronic-compartment access door was removed. (1) Apply sealant to the rubber seal surface. A minimum of 24 hours is necessary for the sealant to cure. (2) Install the new rubber seals (2) through (7). (3) Install the electronic-compartment access door (1). (4) Install the tracks (10) and (11). (5) Install the screws (9) and washers (8). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Pull the electronic-compartment access door to the closed position. (2) Pull the pin to lock the door. (3) Do an operational check of the electronic-compartment door warning system ( AMM TASK 52-71-00-700-801-A/500), if the electronic-compartment access door was removed. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 53-11-03 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Remove the safety pin from the solenoid valve of the nose landing gear door (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200) of the aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 53-11-03 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
